page.title: 15EASSIE SCHOOL AND CHURCH
page.content:
Our school was built in 1929, when the roll was 138. At that time the old school was still being used to accomodate the infant department. Children completed their education here and left school at the age of fourteen.Eassie School is now a primary school and we go on to Webster's High School, Kirriemuir, aged twelve. The roll just now is 28.
Eassie Church was built in 1833. In 1936 there was a linkage with Kirkinch and in 1966 it was linked with Newtyle.The Communion Roll is now 92.
